Actions.Name: Get the processing result
Actions.Description: Get the processing result of the specified result ID.

Actions.Name: Get the processing status
Actions.Description: Get the processing status of the specified result ID.

Actions.Name: Render a form
Actions.Description: This API renders a form by specifying the name of a template saved in Docurain beforehand.

Actions.Name: Render a form asynchronously
Actions.Description: API to render a form asynchronously by specifying the name of a template saved in Docurain beforehand.
